# Welcome!

## Getting Started:

Create a *free* account in 

1. [**Google Scholar**](https://scholar.google.com), [**Scopus**](https://scopus.com), [**ORCID**](https://orcid.org); use the latter to sign-in to: [**OverLeaf**](https://www.overleaf.com/) and [**My NCBI**](https://account.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/)

2. [**GitHub**](https://github.com); use to sign-in to [**RStudio Cloud**](https://posit.cloud) and [**VS Code**](https://vscode.dev); integrates with [**OverLeaf**](https://www.overleaf.com/)

3. [**Zotero**](https://www.zotero.org/), a citation manager that integrates with Chrome, Word, Overleaf

4. Create a quarto-rendered github-pages profile at repo named '*CHANGETOYOURUSERNAME.github.io*', similar to [mine](https://github.com/JacobKMcPherson/jacobkmcpherson.github.io). Let me know when this is done so I may add you to [**People**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/people/)

Future endeavors: Science via [**Emerald Cloud Labs (ECL)**](https://www.emeraldcloudlab.com/), [**CLC Genomics (Qiagen)**](https://digitalinsights.qiagen.com/) and [**AWS**](https://aws.amazon.com/), which I maintain access via the SIB's [**AWS-Docker**](https://sib-swiss.github.io/AWS-docker/)

  - Begin reading, writing, publishing in our [Favorite Journals](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=%27SEARCH-TERM%27%20AND%20(%221476-4687%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222058-5276%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221740-1534%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-1784%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221548-7105%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221533-4406%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-547X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221538-3598%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221097-4172%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221934-6069%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221095-9203%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221537-6591%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-4457%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222666-5247%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221098-6596%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221095-8274%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221946-6242%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221529-2916%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-1741%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221759-5053%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221535-2900%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221546-170X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-9985%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221476-5381%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221476-4679%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221755-4349%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222522-5839%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222522-5812%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221750-2799%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222056-676X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222662-8449%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221521-0081%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221521-0103%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221553-7374%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222470-9468%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221362-4962%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-760X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221471-0064%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221367-4811%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221520-5126%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221549-9626%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221549-960X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222662-8457%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221546-1696%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221546-1718%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221471-0080%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-1776%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221473-3099%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221756-1833%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221520-6890%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-3278%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-3251%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-4509%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1601%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1210%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1563%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1555%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1539%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1547%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1466%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221531-2267%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221758-0463%22%5Bta%5D))

# Add markers for each university
for uni in universities:
    icon = AwesomeIcon(
        name='graduation-cap',
        marker_color='red',
        icon_color='white'
    )
    marker = Marker(
        location=(uni["lat"], uni["lon"]),
        draggable=False,
        title=uni["name"],
        icon=icon
    )
    marker.popup = HTML(
        value=f"<b>{uni['name']}</b><br>{uni['city']}"
    )
    m.add_layer(marker)
